2.4.name: wordpress/ambrosite-nextprevious-post-link-plus
2.4.description:
IMPORTANT: Make sure you are using the right plugin.

  • Next/Previous Post Link Plus is intended for use in single post templates.
  • Next/Previous Page Link Plus is intended for use in page templates.

The two plugins have similar sounding, but different, function names. If you mistakenly install the wrong plugin, you will get a "call to undefined function" error. If you want to create next/previous links for your pages, please check out: http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/ambrosite-nextprevious-page-link-plus/

IMPORTANT: This plugin is not compatible with PHP 4. If you try to install it on a host running PHP 4, you will get a parse error. WordPress has officially ended support for PHP 4 as of version 3.2, so you should upgrade to PHP 5.2 n
